attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a period in my working life I paid a reduced NI contribution, known as the married womens contribution.I would like to pay the shortfall on this to my state pension, but this is not allowed. I was contributing to the tax system and my employers were contributing also. I still brought up my children, why if I hadnt worked at all could I make up the shortfall, but not having worked and contributed.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
